definition: (of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa
to cut down/to fell/to dispatch an expedition against/to attack/to boast/Taiwan pr. [fa1]
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of simvastatin on osteoblast metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討降脂藥辛伐他汀對大鼠成骨細胞代謝的影響。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare sustained-release dropping pills of Simvastatin and optimize its preparation technology.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備辛伐他汀緩釋滴丸並優化其製備工藝。

sentences.english: This is achieved by adding fenofibrate to simvastatin.
sentences.chinese: 療效是通過將非諾貝特加入辛伐他汀裏取得的。

sentences.english: Objective: To understand the adverse effects of simvastatin and promote rational medication.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解辛伐他汀的副作用，提倡合理用藥。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the dissolution rate in vitro of simvastatin pills.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討辛伐他汀滴丸的體外溶出速率。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To develop a method for the determination of Simvastatin in human plasma.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立測定人血漿中辛伐他汀的方法。

sentences.english: Mr. Brown decided to start taking a low dose of simvastatin.
sentences.chinese: Brown先生已經決定開始服用小劑量的辛伐他汀。

definition: propranolol (beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure)
propranolol (beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure)
diclofenac sodium, a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce swelling and as painkiller/also called voltaren 扶他林
to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
